original_title: Menopause The Musical: Live from Texas
overview: Come join our sisterhood, live from Richardson, Texas! Four women at a lingerie sale have nothing in common but a black lace bra—and memory loss, hot flashes, night sweats, not enough sex, too much sex, and more! This hilarious musical parody set to classic tunes from the ‘60s, ‘70s, and ‘80s will have you cheering and dancing in the aisles! See what more than 17 million women and fans worldwide have been laughing about for 20 years!
title: Menopause The Musical: Live from Texas
